## Welcome!

Welcome to my new website, built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/). This blog will feature posts about:

- Economic research and analysis
- Climate economics and sustainable development
- Data science and computational methods
- R programming and reproducible research

Stay tuned for more content!

## About This Site

This website is built using Quarto, which allows me to:

- Write content in Markdown
- Execute R code inline
- Generate reproducible research outputs
- Maintain a multilingual site (English, French, Chinese)

Check out my [publications](/publications.html) page to see my research work.
